item.title: Where to put xandy coord to make my server pvp?
item.dc:creator: @T-boy T-boy
item.description:
@T-boy wrote:

okay look your wild will be this one

	public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
		if (Type == 1) {
			if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) {
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3); // -dead fury
outStream.writeByteA(1);
outStream.writeString("Attack");
outStream.endFrameVarSize(); 
				return true;
			}
		} else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	}

and your safe arears will be the banks so it will be like this

[code]
public boolean isInbank() {
if (absX >= && absX <= && absY >= && absY <=) {
return true;

} else {
  return false;
}[/code]

}

public boolean IsItemInBag(int ItemID) {

item.title: Where to put xandy coord to make my server pvp?
item.dc:creator: @nbk4life nbk4life
item.description:
@nbk4life wrote:

my servers is like this

if (Type == 1) {
if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3356 && absY >= 3244 && absY <=3257) {
or like this and can u tell me what to do??

outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3); // -dead fury
outStream.writeByteA(1);
outStream.writeString(“Attack”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
return true;
}
} else if (Type == 2) {
if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}

public boolean IsItemInBag(int ItemID) {
	for (int element : playerItems) {
		if ((element - 1) == ItemID) {
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
